name: Monopolka
description:
Standard Monopoly Game.
You need to become a market monopoly and have monetary superiority over other players.
You can choose a "Furry" characters of available and choose color. Сan improve your business to get more profit from them. Trade with other players to get more benefits.
Main goal of the game - to remain the only player able to pay for visits to foreign companies. If you can not pay - you lose and waiting for the next round.

Note: This is a multiplayer game, to start the game, need at least 2 players. The maximum can be 10.
At the moment, you can connect to the server only by ip. Server must take care that port 45666 is opened.
If the client was connected to a server but the client did not receive this notification, client need try to connect again.
